attributes.action: seriously consider that all MPs and future MPs should have higher qualifications.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to re-establish the reputation of MPs,currently at a very low level, and in order to rehabilitate our perception of the Mother of Parliaments,future MPs should be required to have an academic qualification of a demanding nature, or an equivalent measure of their ability; as well a reference of integrity and honesty,  before being allowed to sit.
